votingsExp: Welcome to the votings dashboard. Below are listed the published votings. Click on any of them to see information about them, vote or check the results.
nopublishedvotings: There are no published votings yet in this category.
votestatus_0: You can't vote because this voting is not currently running.
votestatus_1: You can't vote because you aren't in the voters whitelist.
votestatus_2: You can't vote because you are in the voters blacklist.
votestatus_3: You can't vote because you aren't old enough to vote.
votestatus_5: Your generated code has no uses left.
confirmationExp: Are you sure you want to submit the following?
votingsubmitted: Your ballot has been successfully submitted.
votingsubmitted_plural: Your ballots have been successfully submitted.
verifyauthenticity: Below you have some data you can use when the voting finishes to verify the autenticity of your ballot. Learn more.
verifyauthenticity_plural: Below you have some data you can use when the voting finishes to verify the autenticity of your ballots. Copy it somewhere safe, because we will not be able to show it to you again. Learn more
ballotsexactly: You have to select exactly %0 ballots.
maxballots: Please, select a maximum of %0 ballots.
